1. To ensure that all information have been received related to customer requests (like; Delivery Note (DN), Reverse Note (RN), Material Movement Form (MMF), Packing Note (PN) and Public Request (PR)) by email or by hand and same have been communicated to the Assistant Manager (Region) on immediate basis.
2. Ensure that the driver did his vehicle tank full by and then he can rest in the warehouse till the next order of the Admin Officer.
3. Ensure to timely deliver all the equipment.
4. To collect all necessary information from POC to deliver equipment/goods and handover to AM:
· Onsite Receiver Name & Contact No
· Cluster Engr Name & Contact No
· Site Guard Name & Contact No
· Site Map Coordinates (Latitude, Longitude)
· Site Access Clearance Status
5. To ensure that the driver didn’t carry out vehicle without permission.
6. Responsible for activities and route planning given by the software and its implementations
7. To ensure following documents before trip departure:
· Printed Trip/ Gate Pass Form
· Vehicle Log Book after data entry
· Sygic Map application
· Printed DN/ RN/ BOQ/ ATF/ SMR/ MMR, etc.
· Printed Sites Information
· Printed Google Route Map
8. Any other duty as assigned by the higher authorities.
Qualification:
Graduation preferably in Supply Chain
Experience:
3-5 years in logistic coordination preferably in a logistics company.

Job Title: Data Entry and Quality Assurance Executive Required
Job Description:
A data quality analyst is responsible for ensuring an organization’s data is accurate, complete, consistent, reliable, and accessible. They perform data audits, develop data quality standards, identify anomalies, and fix errors, playing a critical role throughout the data lifecycle. Their work is vital for maintaining strategic planning, operational efficiency, customer satisfaction, and regulatory compliance, preventing financial losses, decreased trust, and legal issues arising from poor data quality
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Fresher
Pay: Up to Rs45,000.00 per month

Job Description:
Join our team as a Data Entry Specialist and play a vital role in maintaining accurate and up-to-date information. Your primary responsibility will be to input, update, and manage data within our systems efficiently and accurately. Attention to detail is crucial as you'll be responsible for ensuring the integrity of our databases. Additionally, you may be tasked with verifying data accuracy, conducting quality checks, and assisting in data analysis projects as needed.
Responsibilities:
Input, update, and manage data within our systems accurately and efficiently.
Conduct regular quality checks to ensure data integrity and accuracy.
Assist in verifying data from various sources and resolving discrepancies.
Collaborate with team members to identify opportunities for process improvements.
Adhere to data entry standards and guidelines to maintain consistency across databases.
Support data analysis projects by gathering and organizing data as required.
Requirements:
Proven experience in data entry or related field.
Proficiency in data entry software and Microsoft Office Suite.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
Excellent organizational and time management skills.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Familiarity with data analysis tools and techniques is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent work experience.
Previous experience in data analysis or database management.
Knowledge of industry-specific data entry standards and regulations.
Experience with CRM systems or other database software.
fresh to 6 months
We Offer:
Job Type: Full-time
Market Competitive Salary
Performance Bonus
Increments
Learning Environment
CC Fund
Meal
Health Insurance + Life Insurance
Fuel Allowance

Job Responsibilities:
Supporting all updates for regulatory processing, including onboarding of employee documentation.
Organising and maintaining files, records, and documents.Handling incoming and outgoing correspondence, including calls, email, SMS, and social media messages.
Screening and directing phone calls, emails, and messages.
Ensuring timely response to inquiries and requests.
Drafting and editing correspondence, memos, and reports.
Coordinating communication between the client and internal/external stakeholders.
Arranging and coordinating travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and transportation.
Managing the client's multiple business and personal calendars.
Creating one calendar for one view.Scheduling appointments, meetings, and events, coordinating employees to meet schedules.
Coordinating logistics for meetings, Sending reminders and ensuring punctuality.
Demonstrating proficiency in various computer software programs essential for executive assistance, including Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and Google Workspace.
Data entry and basic financial management tasks.
Familiarity with QuickBooks a plus.Conducting research and gathering information as needed.
Providing support with marketing activities, if applicable.Expense managementTrack employee work schedules, ensure all employee training is scheduled.
Ordering supplies, and products; coordination with vendors.
Requirement:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Strong organisational and multitasking abilities.
Proficiency in computer software and technology relevant to executive assistance.
Prior experience in a similar role preferred.
Ability to maintain confidentiality and exercise discretion.
Flexibility and adaptability to changing priorities and environments.
Knowledge of QuickBooks and marketing principles is an added advantage.
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: Up to Rs100,000.00 per month
Application Question(s):
Willing to work Eastern Time Zone
Education:
Bachelor's (Required)
Experience:
Executive Assistant: 2 years (Required)
Marketing and Sales in US: 2 years (Required)
Language:
English (Required)

Administrative supervisors are in charge of managing the day-to-day operations of their organization’s administrative support staff. They commonly oversee a team of clerical workers, data entry clerks, receptionists, and other administrative professionals who provide general support to the company’s employees. Administrative supervisors may also be responsible for overseeing other types of staff as well, such as salespeople or customer service representatives. In either case, they are tasked with ensuring that all of these individuals are performing their jobs effectively and working together as a cohesive unit.
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Fresher
Pay: Up to Rs48,000.00 per month

Company Description
BIN BAKAR Electronics is one of the biggest retail chains in the electronics market in Lahore, offering a world-class shopping experience both in-store and online. With a focus on customer satisfaction, BIN BAKAR provides a wide range of electronic appliances and innovative products across various categories. With multiple aesthetically-designed showrooms conveniently located in Lahore, BIN BAKAR has become a trusted name in the industry.
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Computer Operator at BIN BAKAR Electronics in Lahore. The Computer Operator will be responsible for day-to-day computer operations and back-office tasks. This includes ensuring smooth and efficient operation of computer systems, maintaining communication channels, and performing computer-related duties such as typing and data entry.
Requirement:
Qualification: B.com /BBA / Equivalent
Ms Office skills ( Especially Excel)
Excellent Typing Speed
Computer Operations and Computer Literacy skills
Effective communication skills
Experience in back office operations
Proficient typing skills
Detail-oriented and organized
Ability to multi-task and prioritize tasks
Experience in the electronics industry is a plus
Job location: DHA Lahore
Salary & other benefits
Market competitive salary with other benefits
Other Perks & Benefits:
Annual Increment
Mobile Allowance
Medical
Casual, sick, Annual & wedding Leaves
Leave Encashment
Interest Free Loans

We are looking for a skilled Admin/HR Officer to undertake a variety of HR administrative duties. The Admin/HR Officer will facilitate daily HR functions, including managing the recruitment process, maintaining employee records, and handling employee queries. The ideal candidate will be highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to prioritize tasks effectively.
Responsibilities:
Assist with recruitment process by identifying candidates, conducting interviews, and onboarding new employees.
Maintain employee records and ensure compliance with HR policies and procedures.
Manage employee queries regarding HR-related issues.
Coordinate employee training and development programs.
Assist in the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures.
Handle administrative tasks such as filing, data entry, and scheduling appointments.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or any field.
Minimum one year experience as an HR/Admin Officer or similar role, knowledge of compliance will be preferred.
Knowledge of HR/Admin functions, including recruitment, payroll, and employee relations.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Excellent organizational and time management abilities.
Proficiency in MS Office, Urdu Typing and HR software.
Ability to maintain confidentiality of sensitive information.
Salary and benefits
Paid leaves, life insurance, PF, In house Medical Facility, Salary will be offered on the basis of Education and experience.
If you are meet above criteria, send us latest resume at marketing@kashifiqbal.com, info@kashifiqbal.com. Your CV will reach us latest by April 30, 2024
Job Type: Full-time
Application Deadline: 30/04/2024

We are hiring Data Entry Operator to join our Data Team in Lahore office. We need an experienced Data Entry professionals having good Microsoft Word & Excel skills and also having good CV preparation skills. Ideal candidate should have the experience of call center as well.
Candidates must have sound knowledge of using a computer, Microsoft office and internet tools.
Afternoon Shifts (1 pm – 10 pm) PST
Monday through Friday (Sat and Sun are off).
We Offer:
Market Competitive Salary
Increment
Career Growth
Paid Leaves
Interested candidates should submit their CVs to the following;
Ambition BPO Services Team
Contact - hr@ ambitionbpo.net
Please note that this job role is completely office based. We're not offering a remote-job currently.

Pay: Rs30,000.00 - Rs35,000.00 per month
